title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 400.5 - Statements or bills for health services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 400.5 - Statements or bills for health services

State Regulations

Statements or bills for patient health services rendered
in a hospital or by a home health agency as defined in article 28 of the Public

Health Law shall: (a) indicate the
nature of the service for which a charge is being made; (b) indicate that professional or other
services not provided by the hospital, or by the home health agency for which a
charge is not included, may be billed independently; and
(c) be rendered to a patient or the patient's
legal representative without charge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
400.5

Amended

New

York State Register November 13, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 46, eff. 11/13/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
